description: misc/cgo/test and test/bench/go1: enable these tests on windows

messages.text:
Please, note that I can submit this CL only once our windows builders are updated to:

changeset:   14080:5b1777d3a58e
tag:         tip
user:        Alex Brainman <alex.brainman@gmail.com>
date:        Fri Sep 14 12:53:30 2012 +1000
summary:     misc/dashboard/builder: use c:\ as default buildroot on windows

I can update windows-amd64 builder myself, if I am allowed to, and if it hasn't been replaced with new computer. But I have no access to windows-386. Please, help. Thank you.

Alex

On 2012/09/15 13:52:55, bradfitzgoog wrote:
> Updated? How?

Just update repo to the tip and rebuild go builder (and restart it):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6488127/#msg2

Thank you.

Alex

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Updated? How?
On Sep 15, 2012 5:40 AM, <alex.brainman@gmail.com> wrote:

> I have updated windows-amd64 builder. Now I need windows-386 updated too
> before I can submit. If someone can help. Alternatively let me know what
> its credentials are and I will do it myself. Thank you.
>
> Alex
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**6488127/<http://codereview.appspot.com/6488127/>
>

I have updated windows-amd64 builder. Now I need windows-386 updated too before I can submit. If someone can help. Alternatively let me know what its credentials are and I will do it myself. Thank you.

Alex
